name: The Sims: Castaway Stories
content:
files:
- file: N/A:Select the game's setup file (Autorun.exe)
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/The Sims Castaway Stories/TSBin/SimsCS.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    description: Installing dependencies...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing The Sims 2...
    executable: file
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
